import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom';

<Router>
    <Switch>
        <Route exact path='/'>
            <Home />
        </Route>
        <Route path='/about'>
            <About />
        </Route>
        <Route path='/users/:id' children={<User />}></Route>
    </Switch>
</Router>

import { useSelector } from 'react-redux';

const todos = useSelector(state => state.todos);
